member.name: M:Thomson.Assessment.Controllers.CaseController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Find a specific case by its number
member.param: The case number identifier to be retrieved
member.returns: The case with the provided identifier

member.name: M:Thomson.Assessment.Controllers.CaseController.Post(Thomson.Assessment.Model.Case)
member.returns: A boolean with true if the specified case was really created or false if it was not.

member.name: M:Thomson.Assessment.Controllers.CaseController.Put(Thomson.Assessment.Model.Case)
member.param: The case with its new attributes
member.returns: A boolean with true if the specified case was really updated or false if it was not.

member.name: M:Thomson.Assessment.Controllers.CaseController.Delete(System.String)
